story_27_58000/2401_1001_0100_10: It was me who forgot, wasn’t it.
story_27_58000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Before, you told me you wanted to become the
strongest king of all.
story_27_58000/2401_1001_0300_10:
But what people really want from their king 
isn’t strength.
story_27_58000/2401_1001_0400_10:
What they want is a king who cares about them—
someone who treasures the bonds between
people and Pokémon.
story_27_58000/2401_1001_0600_10:
I sought the strength to protect myself and strove
to become the strongest king of all.
story_27_58000/2401_1001_1200_10: I have a favor to ask of you!
